title: SSLbased
extract: SSL (Secure Sockets Layer) is the standard security technology for establishing an encrypted link between a web server and a browser. This link ensures that all data passed between the web server and browsers remain private and integral. ... To be able to create an SSL connection a web server requires an SSL Certificate.
extract_html: SSL (Secure Sockets Layer) is the standard security technology for establishing an encrypted link between a web server and a browser. This link ensures that all data passed between the web server and browsers remain private and integral. ... To be able to create an SSL connection a web server requires an SSL Certificate.
